extendedInfo.description: Draw vertical and horizontal lines to partition the balls into smaller spaces.  Once the balls are contained, you get to move on to the next level.New in 1.3: explosions instead of starting the level over when losing a ball.  Bonus lives every few levels.Source code available at http://code.google.com/p/apps-for-android

reviews.title: Simple but fun tactical game
reviews.comment: You have to time your line drawing to not be caught out by the ball(s). So tests your simple tactical skills. Like an arcade game from the 1980\'s but that game had you drawing boxes to contain spinning lines
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice and simple, pls add multiple line drawing, bonus items and game modes like Trap! and it will get more stars! Thanks 4 a simple and fun game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I really like the game. If you could add the option to continue your game when you lose your last life would be great. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game is shity my friend austin schmit told but it was gay he lives in champlin this game sucks

reviews.comment: Great game but the lines are made very slowly and im always searching for the middle line to swipe my finger. Very good game though. Keeps me entertai
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addicting!
reviews.comment: Love this app! I\'ve had this game since 2008, still keeps me interested.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can only get to level 5... is there any way to make the sensitivity better? Almost have to play with a stylus

reviews.comment: Gave trap a try, and it is absolutly hands down better than this version. Everyone, go get trap! Its the best game ive played 4 the g1 yet.

reviews.comment: This game could only be better if the ball amount and the life amount match. But good job

reviews.comment: Most addictive game ever, so fun to play. No problems

reviews.comment: Trap! is better. Needs to have faster draw and support for multiple lines at once.

reviews.comment: Played about 30 seconds and installed. Not very appealing. Could have improvements

reviews.comment: Better than trap... in some ways. I prefer this one!
